Producer: Josh Appelbaum, Andre Nemec, Kendra Haaland
Production Co: Paramount Animation, Ilion Animation Studios, Nickelodeon Movies
Genre: Kids & Family, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Animation
Synopsis: Buckle up for an epic adventure where anything is possible. A young girl named June with a big imagination makes an incredible discovery -- the amusement park of her dreams has come to life. Filled with the world's wildest rides and operated by fun-loving animals, the excitement never ends. But when trouble hits, June and her misfit team of furry friends begin an unforgettable journey to save the park.
Title: Wonder Park
